name: Clown Art
description:
Welcome to Clown Art.

Clown Art keeps you locked in his house and won't let you go.
You wake up in a dark basement, your head hurts and it feels like someone hit you on the head.
The only thing that illuminates the room is a flashlight lying on the shelf.

The main door is locked with different locks and now you will have to search the house and find keys and other items to open the door and escape from this house.
But you have to be careful because Art the Clown hears everything, and if you drop something on the floor or walk on a creaking floor, he will run to where he heard the sound.

If you couldn't escape... well, maybe you can figure out what happens next.


Good luck!
